result.name: Connection Attributes Demo Configuration
result.dynamic_data_schema:
{
	"connection_fields": [{
		"name": "connection.name",
		"label": "Connection Name",
		"type": "text",
		"defaultValue": "APIKeyTest Spoke Connection",
		"hint": "Display name for the Connection", 
                "mandatory":true
	},{
		"name": "connection.extended_attributes.u_date_attr",
		"label": "Date Attr",
		"type": "date",
		"defaultValue": "2015-01-01",
		"hint": "Date", 
                "mandatory":true
	},{
		"name": "connection.extended_attributes.u_boolean_attr",
		"label": "Boolean Attr",
		"type": "checkbox",
		"defaultValue": false,
		"hint": "Date", 
                "mandatory":true
	},{
		"name": "connection.extended_attributes.u_number",
		"label": "Number Attr",
		"type": "number",
		"defaultValue": 23,
		"hint": "Date", 
                "mandatory":true
	},{
		"name": "connection.extended_attributes.u_choice",
		"label": "Choice Attr",
		"type": "choice",
		"defaultValue": "choice2",
		"hint": "Connection URL for provider", 
                "mandatory":true, 
                "choices" : ["choice1", "choice2", "choice3"]
	}, {
		"name": "connection.connection_url",
		"label": "Connection URL",
		"type": "text",
		"defaultValue": "https://<provider-domain-name>.com",
		"hint": "Connection URL for provider", 
                "mandatory":true
	}],
	"credential_fields": [{
		"name": "credential.api_key",
		"label": "API Key",
		"type": "password",
		"defaultValue": "",
		"hint": "API Key for provider",
                "mandatory":true
	}]
}

result.name: API Key Demo Configuration
Docker Connection Configuration
result.dynamic_data_schema:
{
  "connection_fields": [
    {
      "name": "connection.name",
      "label": "Connection Name",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "Docker Spoke Connection",
      "hint": "Display name for the Connection",
      "mandatory": true
    },
    {
      "name": "connection.connection_url",
      "label": "Connection URL",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "https://<provider-domain-name>.com",
      "hint": "Connection URL for provider",
      "mandatory": true
    }
  ],
  "credential_fields": [
    {
      "name": "credential.repository_name",
      "label": "Repository Name",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "",
      "hint": "Repository name for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": true
    },
    {
      "name": "credential.user_name",
      "label": "User Name",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "",
      "hint": "Username for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": false
    },
    {
      "name": "credential.email",
      "label": "Email",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "",
      "hint": "Email for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": false
    },
    {
      "name": "credential.repository_type",
      "label": "Repository Type",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "Public Repository",
      "hint": "Repository type for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": false
    },
    {
      "name": "credential.password",
      "label": "Password",
      "type": "password",
      "defaultValue": "",
      "hint": "Password for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": false
    },
    {
      "name": "credential.server_address",
      "label": "Server Address",
      "type": "text",
      "defaultValue": "",
      "hint": "Server address for outbound authentication",
      "mandatory": false
    }
  ]
}
